title: ZagroxAI GitHub Integration Implementation
description:
Implement a comprehensive integration between the task management system and GitHub using the dedicated ZagroxAI GitHub account. This integration enables automated task assignment, GitHub issue creation, and streamlined collaboration between AI and human developers.

Key features implemented:

1. Task Discovery & Assignment: Automatically assign appropriate tasks to ZagroxAI based on priority and task type
2. Code Contribution Workflow: Set up automated PR creation for AI-completed tasks
3. Documentation & Maintenance: Use ZagroxAI to automatically update documentation when code changes
4. Collaboration Features: Enable ZagroxAI to provide code reviews and suggestions on PRs
5. Integration with Current System: Extended AI task generation to work with GitHub

notes.content: Integration design completed. Created ZagroxAI service, controller, routes, views, and config files.
Extended the GenerateAiTasks command to support automatic assignment to ZagroxAI and GitHub issue creation.
Added dedicated ZagroxAI dashboard for monitoring AI task activities and settings.
Implemented GitHub webhook support for two-way synchronization between tasks and issues.
